ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The wolfbot knew not to push his Wild side to far. Owls and wolves competed in the frozen wilderness he came from, but not here. Pain scorched through his

The wolfbot knew not to push his "Wild" side to far. Owls and wolves 
competed in the frozen wilderness he came from, but not here. Pain 
scorched through his right arm (The one holding her). He knew not to 
release her or she'd claw hhis eyes out. In beast mode her talons 
were her most powerful weapon. Lunarpine lowered his claw anr pulled 
his rifle. holding it up he pointed to the owls chest. Her head 
wasn't as big a part of her robot mode, destroy it and she'd be 
repairable. he was aiming for the one part that held her spark in 
both modes. "BANG" Lunarpine shouted, "Game over" He dropped her to 
the ground and jumped back ready to react if necessary. "When I play 
Wing it's for keeps. So will the Predicons. Remember this lesson and 
it won't be your last.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked at him. Was he really going to kill her? She twisted and 
turned, 
> but he had a good hold on her.  She knew that his wold instints 
were taking 
> over.  She had to react fast.  She let out an ear splitting screek. 
Then she 
> reached with her tallon and scratched his arm, the one that held 
her.  She 
> flapped her wings as hard as she could.  She was flapping her wings 
hard 
> enough to almost lift him off the ground.
> "The game isn't over yet. Kill me and it will be."
> She realized that if he didn't span out of it, the wolf in him 
would kill 
> her. She tried to claw at his face with her talons.
> 
> ----Original message----
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 9:06pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> Lunarpine stopped suddenly, smelling the crow realizing the irony of
> the owls catch. All he could think how he'd under reacted to her
> trick.
> 
> The wolf transformed to bot again and lunged forward pinning the owl
> to the ground."You let your gaurd down before confirming the game 
was
> over." He raised a claw to the owls throat. "So what am I going to 
do
> with a dead carcas?" He lifted Shadow Wing into the ait claw still 
poised 
> for the kill.
> 
> 
> 
>
